title: GreenPark Welcomes MLS to its Sports Metaverse
itunes:title: GreenPark Welcomes MLS to its Sports Metaverse
description:
Major League Soccer is teaming up with GreenPark Sports, a mobile game and digital experience developer, to enhance the fan experience in GreenPark's new virtual world. Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch speak with Chris Schlosser, MLS Senior Vice President of Media, and Ken Martin, Co-Founder and CEO of GreenPark Sports, to discuss the partnership.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
